ExampleDesign.Name: microblaze_v_preset
ExampleDesign.Description:
This embedded design offers a MicroBlaze V subsystem that can be targeted for the following use cases.
Microcontroller: This is a cache-less processor subsystem optimized for low-latency highly deterministic operations.
All designs include basic peripherals such as an I2C controller, SPI Controller, UART, Timer and Interrupt Controller.
